title: The moon illusion - Andrew Vanden Heuvel

multiple-choice.question: What is the phenomenon that has puzzled people since ancient times, and is still not fully understood?

options.text: The way the Earth's atmosphere affects the light from the sun

options.label: D

options.label: C

title: What is chemical equilibrium? - George Zaidan and Charles Morton

options.label: C
options.text: To prioritize the order of clauses

options.label: D
